text:
The Pennsylvania State University
UNIVERSITY PARK • PENNSYLVANIA
Division of
Academic Researck and Services
405 Old Main
UNiversity 5-7675
February 2?, 1961
Mr. William G. Harley
President
The National Association of Educational
Broadcasters
Dupont Circle Building
1346 Connecticut Avenue
Washington 6, D. C.
Dear Bills
I sincerely regret that it will not be
possible for me to get to the board meeting in
Milwaukee on March 15* 1 do expect to attend the
April 29 meeting in Columbus at the end of IERT,
however, I have previously accepted an invitation
from John Meaney to present a paper at a meeting
he is chairing at IERT on that Saturday morning.
I am certainly concerned about the exchange
of letters between Swarzwalder, Budick and NAEB.
I hope they prove to be a “storm in a teacup.
Plans for realignment of the roles of NAEB, JCEB
and NETRC appear to be Inevitable and are moving
in a reasonable direction it seems to me.
Kindest regardst
Sincerely,
L. P. Greenhill
Associate Director
LPGsfh
